title: Tester la connexion au serveur WSUS
description: V√©rifie la configuration et la connectivit√© au serveur WSUS

windowsCommandTemplate.name: Test-NetConnection
windowsCommandTemplate.commandPattern: powershell -Command "$WUServer = (Get-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsUpdate' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue).WUServer; if ($WUServer) { Write-Host 'WSUS Server: ' $WUServer; Test-NetConnection -ComputerName ($WUServer -replace 'http://|https://|/' -split ':')[0] -Port 8530 } else { Write-Host 'Aucun serveur WSUS configur√©' }"

notes: V√©rifie la configuration du registre et teste la connectivit√© r√©seau. Port 8530 = HTTP, 8531 = HTTPS.
